trans-unit.source: You should not implement this interface, as it is used only by the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInterop> class internally to represent the unmanaged version of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction> interface of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices> namespace.

You should not implement any method of this interface, as it is used only by the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInterop> class internally to represent the unmanaged version of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction> interface of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices> namespace.
An optional <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.BOID"></xref> that indicates why the transaction is being aborted.
This parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, indicating that no reason for the abort is provided.
This value must be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

When `async` is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, an asynchronous abort is performed and the caller must use <xref uid="langword_csharp_ITransactionOutcomeEvents" name="ITransactionOutcomeEvents" href=""></xref> to learn about the outcome of the transaction.
For values of `commitType`, see `ITransaction::Commit` in the OLE DB Programmers Reference.

You should not implement any method of this interface, as it is used only by the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInterop> class internally to represent the unmanaged version of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction> interface of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices> namespace.
This value must be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
A value taken from the OLE DB enumeration <xref uid="langword_csharp_XACTTC" name="XACTTC" href=""></xref>.

You should not implement any method of this interface, as it is used only by the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionInterop> class internally to represent the unmanaged version of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction> interface of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices> namespace.
Pointer to the caller-allocated <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.XACTTRANSINFO"></xref> structure that will receive information about the transaction.
This value must not be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
